title: Index size is huge
description:
Hi,

We are running a custom app which do the indexing with dovecot. The problem we are facing that index size is high. 

Like for 1GB the index size will be around 800MB. Is there a way to reduce the index size. We do store fields.

Regards,
Rakesh

comments.author: Aleksander M. Stensby
comments.content:
Please refer usage questions to the mailinglists as Jira is for reporting bugs and new features.
http://lucene.apache.org/solr/mailing_lists.html
The correct list for your needs would be the solr user list: solr-user@lucene.apache.org.
